10
11#include "modules/audio_coding/codecs/isac/fix/source/pitch_estimator.h"
12
13#ifdef WEBRTC_HAS_NEON
14#include <arm_neon.h>
15#endif
16
17#include "common_audio/signal_processing/include/signal_processing_library.h"
18#include "rtc_base/compile_assert_c.h"
19
20extern int32_t WebRtcIsacfix_Log2Q8(uint32_t x);
21
22void WebRtcIsacfix_PCorr2Q32(const int16_t* in, int32_t* logcorQ8) {
23 int16_t scaling,n,k;
24 int32_t csum32, lys, lcs;
25 int64_t ysum64;
26 const int32_t oneQ8 = 1 << 8; // 1.00 in Q8
27 const int16_t* x;
28 const int16_t* inptr;
29
30 x = in + PITCH_MAX_LAG / 2 + 2;
31 scaling = WebRtcSpl_GetScalingSquare((int16_t*)in,
32 PITCH_CORR_LEN2,
33 PITCH_CORR_LEN2);
34 ysum64 = 1;
35 csum32 = 0;
36 x = in + PITCH_MAX_LAG / 2 + 2;
37 for (n = 0; n < PITCH_CORR_LEN2; n++) {
38 ysum64 += in[n] * in[n] >> scaling; // Q0
39 csum32 += x[n] * in[n] >> scaling; // Q0
40 }
41 logcorQ8 += PITCH_LAG_SPAN2 - 1;
42 lys = WebRtcIsacfix_Log2Q8((uint32_t)ysum64) >> 1; // Q8, sqrt(ysum)
43 if (csum32 > 0) {
44 lcs = WebRtcIsacfix_Log2Q8((uint32_t)csum32); // 2log(csum) in Q8
45 if (lcs > (lys + oneQ8)) { // csum/sqrt(ysum) > 2 in Q8
46 *logcorQ8 = lcs - lys; // log2(csum/sqrt(ysum))
47 } else {
48 *logcorQ8 = oneQ8; // 1.00
49 }
50 } else {
51 *logcorQ8 = 0;
52 }
53
54
55 for (k = 1; k < PITCH_LAG_SPAN2; k++) {
56 inptr = &in[k];
57 ysum64 -= in[k - 1] * in[k - 1] >> scaling;
58 ysum64 += (int32_t)(in[PITCH_CORR_LEN2 + k - 1])
59 * in[PITCH_CORR_LEN2 + k - 1] >> scaling;
60
61#ifdef WEBRTC_HAS_NEON
62 {
63 int32_t vbuff[4];
64 int32x4_t int_32x4_sum = vmovq_n_s32(0);
65 // Can't shift a Neon register to right with a non-constant shift value.
66 int32x4_t int_32x4_scale = vdupq_n_s32(-scaling);
67 // Assert a codition used in loop unrolling at compile-time.
68 RTC_COMPILE_ASSERT(PITCH_CORR_LEN2 %4 == 0);
69
70 for (n = 0; n < PITCH_CORR_LEN2; n += 4) {
71 int16x4_t int_16x4_x = vld1_s16(&x[n]);
72 int16x4_t int_16x4_in = vld1_s16(&inptr[n]);
73 int32x4_t int_32x4 = vmull_s16(int_16x4_x, int_16x4_in);
74 int_32x4 = vshlq_s32(int_32x4, int_32x4_scale);
75 int_32x4_sum = vaddq_s32(int_32x4_sum, int_32x4);
76 }
77
78 // Use vector store to avoid long stall from data trasferring
79 // from vector to general register.
80 vst1q_s32(vbuff, int_32x4_sum);
81 csum32 = vbuff[0] + vbuff[1];
82 csum32 += vbuff[2];
83 csum32 += vbuff[3];
84 }
85#else
86 int64_t csum64_tmp = 0;
87 if(scaling == 0) {
88 for (n = 0; n < PITCH_CORR_LEN2; n++) {
89 csum64_tmp += (int32_t)(x[n]) * inptr[n];
90 }
91 } else {
92 for (n = 0; n < PITCH_CORR_LEN2; n++) {
93 csum64_tmp += ((int32_t)(x[n]) * inptr[n]) >> scaling;
94 }
95 }
96 csum32 = csum64_tmp;
97#endif
98
99 logcorQ8--;
100
101 lys = WebRtcIsacfix_Log2Q8((uint32_t)ysum64) >> 1; // Q8, sqrt(ysum)
102
103 if (csum32 > 0) {
104 lcs = WebRtcIsacfix_Log2Q8((uint32_t)csum32); // 2log(csum) in Q8
105 if (lcs > (lys + oneQ8)) { // csum/sqrt(ysum) > 2
106 *logcorQ8 = lcs - lys; // log2(csum/sqrt(ysum))
107 } else {
108 *logcorQ8 = oneQ8; // 1.00
109 }
110 } else {
111 *logcorQ8 = 0;
112 }
113 }
114}
115
